thread.title: City doubles number of walls that spray back
thread.title_full: City doubles number of walls that spray back - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Lizzie Johnson
title: City doubles number of walls that spray back
text:
Photo: Scott Strazzante, The Chronicle Wayne Howard stands in the corner by a wall that has been coated with pee-repelling paint at the 16th and Mission Street Bart Plaza in San Francisco, Calif., on Thursday, July 30, 2015. Wayne Howard stands in the corner by a wall that has been coated...
To all the late-night revelers who answer nature’s call on city walls: Beware. Again.
